companyName: Hartford Multifactor Low Volatility International Equity
description:
The investment seeks to provide investment results that, before fees and expenses, correspond to the total return performance of the Hartford Multifactor Low Volatility International Equity Index.
 The fund generally invests at least 80 percent of its assets in the equity securities that are components of the index and in depositary receipts (such as ADRs, GDRs and EDRs) representing securities of the index. The index is designed to outperform a capitalization-weighted universe of developed and emerging markets located outside the U.S. with up to one quarter less volatility over a complete market cycle.
